summary: This bill, the United States Leadership in Immersive Technology Act of 2025, aims to promote the use of immersive technology (augmented, virtual, and mixed reality) in the U.S. It establishes an Immersive Technology Advisory Panel to make recommendations on economic competitiveness, collaboration between government and private sector, ethical use and data protection, and global leadership in this technology. The bill tasks the panel with studying the industry, assessing its impact, and reporting findings and recommendations to Congress.
